mapper.select: select count(*) from course_plan where cid = #{cid.id} and tid = #{tid.id} and time_place1 = #{time_place1.id} and time_place2 = #{time_place2.id} and time_place3 = #{time_place3.id}
select count(*) from course_plan where id = #{id}
select count(*) from course_plan where tid = #{tid}

select cp.*,sc.*,c.*,t.*,tp1.*,tp2.*,tp3.*,p1.*,p2.*,p3.*,c.id 'cidid',c.name 'cidname',t.name 'tidname', tp1.weeks 'weeks1',tp1.week 'week1',tp1.time 'time1',tp1.place 'place1',p1.name 'name1', tp2.weeks 'weeks2',tp2.week 'week2',tp2.time 'time2',tp2.place 'place2',p2.name 'name2', tp3.weeks 'weeks3',tp3.week 'week3',tp3.time 'time3',tp3.place 'place3',p3.name 'name3' from course_plan cp left join select_course sc on sc.cpid = cp.id left join course c on c.id = cp.cid left join teacher t on t.id = cp.tid left join time_place tp1 on tp1.id = cp.time_place1 left join time_place tp2 on tp2.id = cp.time_place2 left join time_place tp3 on tp3.id = cp.time_place3 left join classroom p1 on p1.id = tp1.place left join classroom p2 on p2.id = tp2.place left join classroom p3 on p3.id = tp3.place where cid not in (select cid from course_plan where id in (select cpid from select_course where sid = #{id})) limit #{start},10
select count(*) from course_plan where cid not in (select cid from course_plan where id in (select cpid from select_course where sid = #{id}))
